testcase.name: Check Balance Value Exists
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user is logged in...................................................passed Then the user can see that the "Balance Text Label" exists..................passed And the user can see that the "Balance Value" has a number..................passed

testcase.name: Check Balance Value Updates After Delivery
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user is logged in...................................................passed And the user sees the Assigned Orders list..................................passed And the user sees the Balance value.........................................passed When the user clicks on one of the "Assigned Order Item" in the Assigned Orders list.passed And the user sees how much he is going to earn for that delivery............passed And the user clicks on the "Delivered" button...............................passed Then the user sees that the balance has gone up.............................passed
